title.narrative: Afghanistan Strategic Grain Reserve ( SGR Project )

description.narrative: The development objective of the project is “To establish a wheat strategic reserve to be available to Afghan households to meet their needs following emergency situations and improve the efficiency of the grain storage management.”

participating-org.narrative: Islamic Republic of Afghanistan - Ministry of Finance

condition.narrative: Ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with the Safeguards Instruments, in a manner and substance satisfactory to theAssociation.
Ensure that, at all times during Project implementation, the PIU shall be headed by a Project Director, and adequately staffed withprofessional and administrative staff.

Establish not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date and thereafter maintain at all times during Project implementation,a Project Steering Committee, headed by the Minister of MAIL (or his/her delegate) and comprised of representatives of otherrelevant Ministries and stakeholders.

Establish not later than three (3) years after the Effective Date and thereafter maintain at all times during Projectimplementation, the legal government-owned corporation referred to in Part 1(a) of the Project.
Maintain, at all times during Project implementation, within MAIL’s regular structure, a project implementation unit with functionsand responsibilities acceptable to the Association.

Prepare and adopt by not later than October 1st of each year, an annual work plan and budget (the “Annual Work Plan and Budget”)for the following fiscal year in a manner and substance satisfactory to the Association and take necessary and appropriate actionsto ensure that adequate budgetary allocations are: (i) included in its budget for annual counterpart funds; and (ii) transferred toMAIL on a timely manner in accordance with the Annual Work Plan and Budget.

actual.value: This activity was removed from the project by the government who transferred it to National Statistics and Information Authority.

title.narrative: Component B: Subcomponet B6: New Warehouse Established
Component B: Silos Rehabilitated (Mazar-e-Sharif and Pul-e-Khumri)
Component B: Greenfield Silos Built ( Kabul, Kandahar and Herat)
Component A: Subcomponent A1: SGR Corporation Established

actual.value: The Strategic Grain Reserve Corporation (SGRC) charter has been prepared and submitted to Ministry of Justice for review and willbe submitted for the approval of the cabinet thereafter. With the project closure on August 31, 2020, this activity was dropped.
